# StorageEndpointProperties

The properties of the Azure Storage endpoint for file upload.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**connection_string** | **str** | The connection string for the Azure Storage account to which files are uploaded. | 
**container_name** | **str** | The name of the root container where you upload files. The container need not exist but should be creatable using the connectionString specified. | 
**sas_ttl_as_iso8601** | **str** | The period of time for which the SAS URI generated by IoT Hub for file upload is valid. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-file-upload#file-upload-notification-configuration-options. | [optional]
